name: Puzzle Tactics
description: Puzzle Tactics is a turn-based and grid-based tactics game played in various small levels. You play as the blue team with the goal of defeating the red team's units before losing your own. Later levels are more difficult and introduce more unit types in battle.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: 1 Ghz Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Intel HD Graphics Storage: 20 MB available space
